# Setup

```{r}
# Packages
library(tidyverse)
library(here)

# Directories
data.dir <- here::here("data", "raw-ish")

# Read Data
review <- as.data.frame(readRDS(file.path(data.dir, "exported-doc-review.Rds")))

```

## Match key to review

```{r}
data <- left_join(review, key)
```

## Separate stat and detail

```{r}
stat <- data %>% filter(type == "stat")
detail <- data %>% filter(type == "detail")
```
